sentence: Israel  has  killed  more  than  22,000  people  since  the  war  began,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza.

sentence: Israel's  offensive  started  after  Hamas  gunmen  launched  a  surprise  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  1,200  people,  most  of  them  civilians,  and  taking  about  240  people  hostage.
